TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintPreviewDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.Form

summary.span: 表示包含用于从 Windows 窗体应用程序中进行打印的 的对话框窗体。

span.span: Represents a dialog box form that contains a for printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例类，则一些读/写属性被设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 有关打印功能与 Windows 窗体的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果你想要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示设置和属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定该窗体包含名为`TreeView1`包含对象。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个属性对象必须设置为运行该示例的计算机可以访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 设置每个属性设置为一个字符串，标识指定的文件属性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，你可以设置`TreeNode1.Tag`到"c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`到"recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含名为`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名为的按钮`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请调用`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例、属性初始化为`null`。When you create an instance of , the property is initialized to `null`. 你可以在运行时更改此属性的值。You can change the value for this property at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示设置和属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定该窗体包含名为`TreeView1`包含对象。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个属性对象必须设置为运行该示例的计算机可以访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 设置每个属性设置为一个字符串，标识指定的文件属性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，你可以设置`TreeNode1.Tag`到"c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`到"recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含名为`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名为的按钮`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请调用`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::IButtonControl ^ AcceptButton { System::Windows::Forms::IButtonControl ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::IButtonControl ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户按 Enter 键时所单击的窗体上的按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the button on the form that is clicked when the user presses the ENTER key.

value.span: ，表示要用作窗体的“接受”按钮的按钮。

span.span: An that represents the button to use as the accept button for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 此属性可以指定当用户在你的应用程序中按 ENTER 键时出现的默认操作。This property allows you to designate a default action that occurs when the user presses the ENTER key in your application. 必须是分配给此属性的按钮当前窗体上或位于当前窗体上的容器。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 可用于此属性，例如，允许用户能够快速导航是允许他们在他们而不是手动单击接受按钮用鼠标结束时按 ENTER 键的一种简单形式。You can use this property, for example, to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse. 如果窗体上的当前所选的控件截获 ENTER 键，并处理它，可能未激活接受按钮。The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it. 例如，多行文本框控件允许选择要在控件中插入新行字符时按 ENTER 键。For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoScale { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否调整其大小以适合该窗体上使用的字体高度，以及是否缩放其控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form adjusts its size to fit the height of the font used on the form and scales its controls.

value.span: 如果窗体根据分配给它的当前字体自动缩放本身及其控件，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the form will automatically scale itself and its controls based on the current font assigned to the form; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性以允许你的窗体，并为自动调整其控件基于的字体中的更改。You can use this property to allow your form and its controls to automatically adjust based on changes in the font. 这可在应用程序字体其中可能会增加或减少基于由 Windows 为使用指定的语言。This can be useful in applications where the font might increase or decrease based on the language specified for use by Windows. 以获取要使用比例的窗体将自动的大小属性。To obtain the size the form will auto scale to, use the property. 如果你想要确定大小窗体将自动调整为根据特定的字体，使用方法。If you want to determine the size the form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the method.

value.span: 表示自动滚动边距的高度和宽度的 ，单位为像素。

span.span: A that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 自动滚动边距用于确定可滚动的控件的边缘的距离。The auto-scroll margin is used to determine the distance from the edges of the scrollable control. 如果分配给此属性的值小于到父可滚动的控件的子控件的边缘的距离，显示相应的滚动条。If the distance from the edge of a child control to parent-scrollable control is less than the value assigned to this property, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.

span.span: A that represents the minimum height and width, in pixels, of the scroll bars.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用来管理分配给自动滚动条的屏幕大小。The property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a control box is displayed in the caption bar of the form.

span.span: if the form displays a control box in the upper-left corner of the form; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`中的标题栏的左上角显示控件框。If the property is set to `true`, the control box is displayed in the upper-left corner of the caption bar. 控件框是用户可以单击来访问系统菜单。The control box is where the user can click to access the system menu. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的窗体未显示控件框，则该窗体不能关闭使用 ALT + F4 键盘组合。If your form does not display a control box, the form is not able to close using the ALT+F4 keyboard combination.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FormBorderStyle FormBorderStyle { System::Windows::Forms::FormBorderStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FormBorderStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the form.

value.span: ，表示要为窗体显示的边框样式。

span.span: A that represents the style of border to display for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 窗体的边框样式确定的外边缘的窗体的显示方式。The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears. 除了更改窗体的边框显示，某些边框样式阻止窗体的大小。In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized. 例如，边框样式更改为的对话框中的窗体的边框，并阻止窗体在正调整大小。For example, the border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized. 大小或窗体的标题栏区域的可用性，还会影响的边框样式。The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form.

exception.span: 指定值不在有效值范围内。

span.span: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HelpButton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在窗体的标题框中显示“帮助”按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a **Help** button should be displayed in the caption box of the form.

value.span: 若要显示**帮助**按钮在窗体的标题栏中; 否则为。

span.span: to display a **Help** button in the form's caption bar; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 当此属性设置为`true`，问号的小按钮将出现在左侧的标题栏中**关闭**按钮。When this property is set to `true`, a small button with a question mark appears in the caption bar to the left of the **Close** button. 此按钮可用于显示有关你的应用程序的帮助。You can use this button to display Help for your application. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件类向用户显示帮助信息时**帮助**单击的窗体的按钮。You can create an event handler for the event of the class to display Help information to the user when the **Help** button of the form is clicked. 值如果忽略属性最大化或最小化显示框。The value of the property is ignored if the maximize or minimize boxes are shown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Icon { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Icon ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon for the form.
An that represents the icon for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 窗体的图标指定表示在任务栏中，以及为窗体控件框中显示的图标的窗体中的图片。A form's icon designates the picture that represents the form in the taskbar, as well as the icon that is displayed for the control box of the form.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMdiContainer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form is a container for multiple document interface (MDI) child forms.

value.span: 如果该窗体是 MDI 子窗体的容器，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the form is a container for MDI child forms; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 此属性更改为一个 MDI 父窗体的显示和行为的窗体。This property changes the display and behavior of the form to an MDI parent form. 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体显示具有凸起边框的凹陷工作区。When this property is set to `true`, the form displays a sunken client area with a raised border. 分配给父窗体的所有 MDI 子窗体将都显示在其工作区内。All MDI child forms assigned to the parent form are displayed within its client area.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeyPreview { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在将键事件传递到具有焦点的控件前，窗体是否将接收此键事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form will receive key events before the event is passed to the control that has focus.

value.span: 如果窗体将接收所有键事件，则为 ；如果窗体上当前选定控件接收键事件，则为 。

span.span: if the form will receive all key events; if the currently selected control on the form receives key events.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体将接收所有， ，和事件。When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all , , and events. 窗体的事件处理程序已完成处理击键后，键击然后指派给具有焦点的控件。After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus. 此属性可用于在你的应用程序并可以处理击键处理所有击键事件或调用来处理击键的相应控件。You can use this property to process all keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke. 例如，当应用程序使用功能键，你可能想要处理窗体级别，而不是为每个控件都可能会收到击键事件编写代码。For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗体不具有任何可见或启用的控件，它会自动获得所有键盘事件。If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MaximizeBox { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在窗体的标题栏中显示最大化按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the maximize button is displayed in the caption bar of the form.

value.span: 如果为 ，则显示窗体的最大化按钮；否则为 。

span.span: to display a maximize button for the form; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 最大化按钮使用户能够扩大到全屏幕大小的窗口。A maximize button enables users to enlarge a window to full-screen size. 若要显示最大化按钮，你还必须设置窗体的属性为， ， ，或。To display a maximize button, you must also set the form's property to either , , , or . 最大化按钮最大化窗口时将自动成为还原按钮。A maximize button automatically becomes a restore button when a window is maximized. 最小化或还原窗口将自动更改回最大化按钮还原按钮。Minimizing or restoring a window automatically changes the restore button back to a maximize button. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时将窗体最大程度地生成事件。Maximizing a form at run time generates a event. 属性反映窗口的当前状态。The property reflects the current state of the window. 如果你设置属性，窗体最大化独立于任何设置实际上适用于和属性If you set the property to , the form is maximized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the and properties

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size MaximumSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体可调整到的最小大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size the form can be resized to.
A that represents the maximum size for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 此属性可限制为指定的最大大小的窗体的大小。This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified maximum size. 你可以使用此功能同时显示多个窗口时以确保单个窗口不会导致其他窗口来隐藏。You can use this feature when displaying multiple windows at the same time to ensure that a single window does not cause other windows to be hidden.

exception.span: 内的高度或宽度值小于零。

span.span: The values of the height or width within the are less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::MainMenu ^ Menu { System::Windows::Forms::MainMenu ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::MainMenu ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在窗体中显示的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is displayed in the form.

value.span: ，表示要在窗体中显示的菜单。

span.span: A that represents the menu to display in the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 可以使用此属性在运行时的整个菜单集合间进行切换。You can use this property to switch between complete menu sets at run time. 例如，你可以定义一个时多文档界面 (MDI) 窗体具有没有活动的 MDI 子窗体和另一个要显示显示子窗口时显示。For example, you can define one to be displayed when your multiple document interface (MDI) form has no active MDI child forms and another to display when a child window is displayed. 你还可以使用不同要求显示不同的菜单集合的特定条件在你的应用程序中的存在时。You can also use a different when specific conditions that require displaying a different menu set exist in your application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MinimizeBox { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在窗体的标题栏中显示“最小化”按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the minimize button is displayed in the caption bar of the form.

value.span: 如果为 ，则显示窗体的最小化按钮；否则为 。

span.span: to display a minimize button for the form; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 最小化按钮使用户能够最小化窗口图标。A minimize button enables users to minimize a window to an icon. 若要显示的最小化按钮，你还必须设置窗体的属性为， ， ，或。To display a minimize button, you must also set the form's property to either , , , or . > [!NOTE] > 最小化窗体，在运行时生成事件。Minimizing a form at run time generates a event. 属性反映窗口的当前状态。The property reflects the current state of the window. 如果你设置属性，窗体将独立于任何设置实际上适用于最小化和属性。If you set the property to , the form is minimized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size MinimumSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取窗体可调整到的最小大小。

span.span: Gets the minimum size the form can be resized to.
A that represents the minimum size for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 此属性可限制为指定的最小大小的窗体的大小。This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified minimum size. 此功能可用于防止用户将窗口调整为不合需要的大小。You can use this feature to prevent a user from sizing a window to an undesirable size.

exception.span: 内的高度或宽度值小于零。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClosing(class System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClosing (e As CancelEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 为可取消的事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for a cancelable event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与此类无关。This method is not relevant for this class. 方法使预览进行了无效，因此它在重新打开对话框重新生成。The method invalidates the preview so it is regenerated when the dialog is reopened. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: to indicate the contents should be laid out from right to left; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 属性适用于应用程序语言写入从右到左的位置。The property is used for applications where the language is written from right to left. 当同时和属性`true`，镜像将为启用对话框中，并且控件放置和文本将为从右到左。When both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the dialog box, and control placement and text will be from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftLayoutChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant for this class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowInTaskbar { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在 Windows 任务栏中显示窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form is displayed in the Windows taskbar.

value.span: 如果为 ，则运行时在 Windows 任务栏中显示窗体；否则，为 。

span.span: to display the form in the Windows taskbar at run time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 如果窗体是另一种形式的子级，则子窗体不会显示 Windows 任务栏中。If a form is a child of another form, the child form is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. 此属性可用于防止用户选择通过 Windows 任务栏窗体。You can use this property to prevent users from selecting your form through the Windows taskbar. 例如，如果显示**查找和替换**中你的应用程序工具窗口中，你可能想要防止该窗口被选中通过 Windows 任务栏上，因为你将需要应用程序的主窗口和**查找和替换**显示，以便适当地处理搜索的工具窗口。For example, if you display a **Find and Replace** tool window in your application, you might want to prevent that window from being selected through the Windows taskbar, since you would need both the application's main window and the **Find and Replace** tool window displayed in order to process searches appropriately.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size Size { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the form.
A that represents the size of the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 此属性可以在同一时间而不是设置中设置高度和窗体宽度和属性单独。This property allows you to set both the height and width of the form at the same time instead of setting the and properties individually. 如果你想要设置的大小和窗体的位置，则可以使用属性来调整大小和找到的表单基于桌面坐标或使用属性类来设置的大小和窗体位置基于屏幕坐标inates。If you want to set the size and location of a form, you can use the property to size and locate the form based on desktop coordinates or use the property of the class to set the size and location of the form based on screen coordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant for this class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置在窗体右下角显示的大小调整手柄的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the size grip to display in the lower-right corner of the form.

value.span: 获取或设置在窗体右下角显示的大小调整手柄的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the size grip to display in the lower-right corner of the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FormStartPosition StartPosition { System::Windows::Forms::FormStartPosition get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FormStartPosition value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置运行时对话框的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting position of the dialog box at run time.

value.span: 一个 ，表示对话框的起始位置。

span.span: A that represents the starting position of the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以在运行时显示时设置窗体的起始位置。This property enables you to set the starting position of the form when it is displayed at run time. 可以手动或由 Windows 指定的默认位置中显示窗体。The form can be displayed manually or in the default location specified by Windows. 您可以定位要在屏幕的中心或如多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体的窗体其父窗体的中心中显示的窗体。You can also position the form to display in the center of the screen or in the center of its parent form for forms such as multiple document interface (MDI) child forms.

exception.span: 指定值不在有效值范围内。

span.span: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TabStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到此控件上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 控制与属性值`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 通过设置控件的可操作的 tab 键顺序属性值。The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TabStopChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant for this class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Tag { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含有关控件的数据的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the control.

value.span: 一个包含该控件相关数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains data about the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 检索或分配当前与树节点关联的数据。Retrieves or assigns the data currently associated with the tree node. 任何对象派生的类型可以分配给此属性。Any object-derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置此属性，可以分配纯文本。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Text { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Text As String

value.span: 将文本表示为一系列 Unicode 字符。

span.span: Represents text as a series of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class.

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant for this class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TopMost { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否应显示为应用程序的最顶层窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form should be displayed as the topmost form of your application.

value.span: 如果将窗体显示为最顶层窗体，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the form as a topmost form; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 最顶层窗体是重叠所有其他形式，即使它并不是活动或前台形式。A topmost form is a form that overlaps all the other forms even if it is not the active or foreground form. 最顶层窗体始终显示在应用程序的最高点的 z 顺序。Topmost forms are always displayed at the highest point in the z-order of an application. 你可以使用此方法创建会始终显示在你的应用程序，如的窗体**查找和替换**工具窗口。You can use this method to create a form that is always displayed in your application, such as a **Find and Replace** tool window.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color TransparencyKey { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将表示窗体透明区域的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color that will represent transparent areas of the form.

value.span: ，表示要在窗体上透明显示的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display transparently on the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 当属性分配，具有相同的窗体区域将以透明方式显示。When the property is assigned a , the areas of the form that have the same will be displayed transparently. 鼠标的任何操作，例如单击鼠标，在窗体透明区域执行将传输到下的透明区域的窗口。Any mouse actions, such as the click of the mouse, that are performed on the transparent areas of the form will be transferred to the windows below the transparent area. 例如，如果窗体的客户端区域进行透明的则该区域上单击鼠标将发送到低于其任何窗口的单击事件通知。For example, if the client region of a form is made transparent, clicking the mouse on that area will send the event notification of the click to any window that is below it. 如果颜色分配给属性等同于窗体上任何控件，则它们还将显示以透明方式。If the color assigned to the property is the same as any controls on the form, they also will be displayed transparently. 例如，如果你有具有窗体上的控件其属性设置为，控件将以透明方式显示，除非属性控件更改为另一种颜色。For example, if you have a control on a form that has its property set to , the control will be displayed transparently unless the property of the control is changed to a different color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAntiAlias { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打印是否使用操作系统的抗锯齿功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether printing uses the anti-aliasing features of the operating system.

value.span: 如果使用抗锯齿功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if anti-aliasing is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抗锯齿删除参差不齐呈现字体的行。Anti-aliasing removes jagged lines when fonts are rendered. 下面的代码示例演示设置和属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定该窗体包含名为`TreeView1`包含对象。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个属性对象必须设置为运行该示例的计算机可以访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 设置每个属性设置为一个字符串，标识指定的文件属性。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，你可以设置`TreeNode1.Tag`到"c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc"和`TreeNode1.Text`到"recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含名为`PrintPreviewDialog1`和名为的按钮`Button1`。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请调用`InitializePrintPreviewDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class.

This property is not relevant for this class.

value.span: 如果该控件可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FormWindowState WindowState { System::Windows::Forms::FormWindowState get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FormWindowState value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的窗口状态。

span.span: Gets or sets the form's window state.
A that represents the window state of the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表单显示之前，属性始终设置为，不管其初始设置。Before a form is displayed, the property is always set to , regardless of its initial setting. 这反映在， ， ，和属性设置。This is reflected in the , , , and property settings. 如果窗体隐藏后已被证实，这些属性反映以前的状态，直到再次，而不考虑对所做任何更改显示窗体属性。If a form is hidden after it has been shown, these properties reflect the previous state until the form is shown again, regardless of any changes made to the property.

exception.span: 指定值不在有效值范围内。
